channel.title: Montréal Métro Speedruns
channel.description: A feed providing updates on transit speedruns in Montŕeal, QC.
channel.copyright: CC-0. Public domain, baby. Lap it up! By ahc.

item.title: REM Deux-Montagnes branch opens—two new Métro+REM runs and a new record!
item.description: With the opening of the new REM Deux-Montagnes branch, two new Métro+REM runs were recorded today. Evan recorded a time of 4h52m05s, with Alice and Cat starting five minutes after to just eek out a 4h41m02s record before Evan completed his run.

item.title: New Métro+REM+Exo 100% record!
item.description: Andrew Wang set a new Métro+REM+Exo 100% record on Monday (2025-04-14), with a time from first doors close to last door open of 34h51m!

item.title: New STM+REM 100% record!
item.description: Ellie set a new STM+REM 100% record on Monday (2024-12-16), with a time of 3h26m55s!

item.title: New STM 100% record!
item.description: alice, and cat set a new STM 100% record on Monday (2024-12-16), with a time of 2h43m24s!

item.title: New STM 100% run!
item.description: Asa, Blair, and Ellie logged a new STM 100% attempt on Tuesday (2024-12-10), with a time of 3h08m02s, putting them in 3rd place.

item.title: New STM 100% Record!
item.description: Ellie set a new STM 100% record on Friday (2024-11-15), with a time of 2h52m26s! Congradulations!

item.title: Init
item.description: The initialization of this site with current rules and known records.
